Verses: 1 sardhai Sabaiyin Thoodhanukku Nee Ezhudhavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Dhevanudaiya Ezhu Aavigalaiyum Ezhu Natchaththirangalaiyum Udaiyavar Sollugiradhaavadhu; Un Kiriyaigalai Arindhirukkiren, Nee Uyirullavanendru Peyarkondirundhum Seththavanaayirukkiraai.
2 nee Vizhiththukkondu, Saagiradharkedhuvaayirukkiravaigalai Sthirappaduththu; Un Kiriyaigal Dhevanukkumun Niraivullavaigalaaga Naan Kaanavillai.
3 aagaiyaal Nee Kettup Petrukkonda Vagaiyai Ninaivukoorndhu, Adhaik Kaikkondu Manandhirumbu. Nee Vizhiththiraavittaal, Thirudanaippol Unmel Varuven; Naan Unmel Varumvelaiyai Ariyaadhiruppaai.
4 aanaalum Thangal Vasthirangalai Asusippaduththaadha Silaper Sardhaiyilum Unakkundu; Avargal Paaththiravaangalaanapadiyaal Venvasthirandhariththu Ennodekooda Nadappaargal.

5 jeyangollugiravanevano Avanukku Venvasthiram Tharippikkappadum; Jeevapusthakaththilirundhu Avanudaiya Naamaththai Naan Kirukkippodaamal, En Pidhaa Munbaagavum Avarudaiya Thoodhar Munbaagavum Avan Naamaththai Arikkaiyiduven.
6 aaviyaanavar Sabaigalukkuch Sollugiradhaik Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endrezhudhu.

7 piladhelpiyaa Sabaiyin Thoodhanukku Nee Ezhudhavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Parisuththamullavarum, Saththiyamullavarum, Thaaveedhin Thiravukolai Udaiyavarum, Oruvarum Poottakkoodaadhapadikkuth Thirakkiravarum, Oruvarum Thirakkakkoodaadhapadikkup Poottugiravarumaayirukkiravar Sollugiradhaavadhu;

8 un Kiriyaigalai Arindhirukkiren, Unakkuk Konjam Belan Irundhum, Nee En Naamaththai Marudhaliyaamal, En Vasanaththaik Kaikkondapadiyinaale, Idho, Thirandhavaasalai Unakku Munpaaga Vaiththirukkiren, Adhai Oruvanum Poottamaattaan.

9 idho, Yoodharallaadhirundhum Thangalai Yoodharendru Poi Sollugiravargalaagiya Saaththaanudaiya Koottaththaaril Silarai Unakkuk Koduppen; Idho, Avargal Un Paadhangalukku Munpaaga Vandhu Panindhu, Naan Unmel Anbaayirukkiradhai Arindhukollumbadi Seyven.

10 en Porumaiyaikkuriththuchsolliya Vasanaththai Nee Kaaththukkondapadiyinaal, Boomiyil Kudiyirukkiravargalaich Sodhikkumbadiyaagap Poochchakkaraththinmelengum Varappogira Sodhanaikkaalaththirkuth Thappumbadi Naanum Unnaik Kaappen.
11 idho, Seekkiramaai Varugiren; Oruvanum Un Kireedaththai Eduththukkollaadhapadikku Unakkulladhaip Patrikkondiru.

12 jeyangollugiravanevano Avanai En Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththile Thoonaakkuven, Adhinindru Avan Orukkaalum Neenguvadhillai; En Dhevanudaiya Naamaththaiyum En Dhevanaal Paralogaththilirundhirangivarugira Pudhiya Erusalemaagiya En Dhevanudaiya Nagaraththin Naamaththaiyum, En Pudhiyanaamaththaiyum Avanmel Ezhudhuven.
13 aaviyaanavar Sabaigalukkuch Sollugiradhaik Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endrezhudhu.
14 lavodhikkeyaa Sabaiyin Thoodhanukku Nee Ezhudhavendiyadhu Ennavenil: Unmaiyum Saththiyamumulla Saatchiyum, Dhevanudaiya Sirushtikku Aadhiyumaayirukkira Aamen Enbavar Sollugiradhaavadhu;
15 un Kiriyaigalai Arindhirukkiren; Nee Kulirumalla Analumalla; Nee Kuliraayaavadhu Analaayaavadhu Irundhaal Nalamaayirukkum.
16 ippadi Nee Kulirumindri Analumindri Vedhuvedhuppaayirukkirapadiyinaal Unnai En Vaayinindru Vaandhipannippoduven.

17 nee Nirppaakkiyamullavanum, Paridhabikkappadaththakkavanum, Thariththiranum, Kurudanum, Nirvaaniyumaayirukkiradhai Ariyaamal, Naan Aisuvariyavaanendrum, Thiraviyasampannanendrum, Enakku Orukuraivumillaiyendrum Sollugirapadiyaal;

18 naan: Nee Aisuvariyavaanaagumpadikku Neruppile Pudamidappatta Ponnaiyum, Un Nirvaanamaagiya Avalatchanam Thondraadhapadikku Nee Uduththikkolvadharku Venvasdhirangalaiyum Ennidaththile Vaangikkollavum, Nee Paarvaiyadaiyumpadikku Un Kangalukkuk Kalikkampodavum Vendumendru Unakku Aalosanai Sollugiren.
19 naan Nesikkiravargalevargalo Avargalaik Kadindhukondu Sitchikkiren; Aagaiyaal Nee Jaakkiradhaiyaayirundhu, Manandhirumbu.
20 idho, Vaasarpadiyile Nindru Thattugiren; Oruvan En Saththaththaikkettu, Kadhavaith Thirandhaal, Avanidaththil Naan Piravesiththu, Avanode Pojanampannuven, Avanum Ennode Pojanampannuvaan.
21 naan Jeyangondu En Pidhaavinudaiya Singaasanaththile Avarodekooda Utkaarndhadhupola, Jeyangollukiravanevano Avanum Ennudaiya Singaasanaththil Ennodekooda Utkaarumpadikku Arulseyven.
22 aaviyaanavar Sabaigalukkuch Sollugiradhaik Kaadhullavan Ketkakkadavan Endrezhudhu Endraar.
